price: They say, “When will this Decision[11] be if you are truthful?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: [11] i.e., judgment on the Day of Resurrection.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
